message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think a 65-35 split is fairer. After all, it's my turn to propose, and I'm sure you'll find this more agreeable than waiting for the next round.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than it seems. Take it before the money loses more value for you.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to take a slight loss to avoid further inflation.  Accept it, or risk losing even more.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you one last chance. With this inflation, you're losing a lot. Don't be stubborn.
